description: Notifies the result of the update engine execution.

parameters.name: WorkflowToken
parameters.description: The encrypted contents of the update engine execution payload that Service Catalog sends after the Terraform product update workflow starts.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the update engine execution.

parameters.name: Outputs
parameters.description: The output of the update engine execution. (dict) --- The output for the product created as the result of a request. For example, the output for a CloudFormation-backed product that creates an S3 bucket would include the S3 bucket URL. OutputKey (string) --- The output key. OutputValue (string) --- The output value. Description (string) --- The description of the output.

parameters.name: IdempotencyToken
parameters.description: The idempotency token that identifies the update engine execution. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
